snippet.title: ScreamRide Trailer - Xbox One Rollercoasters, Gamescom 2014
snippet.description:
Fresh from Xbox's 2014 Gamescom conference, it's the first trailer for ScreamRide a physics-based coaster game where you can create the monstrous, physically impossible rollercoasters of your dreams.

---

Outside Xbox brings you daily videos about Xbox 360 games and Xbox One games. Join us for new gameplay, original videos, previews, achievements and other things (ask us about the other things). 

Thanks for watching and be excellent to each other in the comments.
